      • isChunkVisible

        public static boolean isChunkVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                     org.bukkit.Chunk chunk)
        Checks whether a given chunk is visible to the client of a player. This actually checks whether the player subscribed to the chunk data, it doesn't do a distance check.
        Parameters:
        player - to check
        chunk - to check
        Returns:
        True if the chunk is visible to the player, False if not

      • isChunkVisible

        public static boolean isChunkVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                     int chunkX,
                                     int chunkZ)
        Checks whether a given chunk is visible to the client of a player. This actually checks whether the player subscribed to the chunk data, it doesn't do a distance check.
        Parameters:
        player - to check
        chunkX - of the chunk to check
        chunkZ - of the chunk to check
        Returns:
        True if the chunk is visible to the player, False if not

        public static int getInventorySlotIndex(int playerInventoryIndex)
        Gets the slot index of an item in a player inventory. These indices differ! NB: Taken over from CraftPlayerInventory source. There is no exposed function for it.

        playerInventoryIndex - to convert
        Returns:
        index of the item slot in the player inventory window
